name: story-generator
description: Story Generator application with feature-first architecture

scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter frontend test && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter frontend format && pnpm --filter backend format
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter frontend typecheck && pnpm --filter backend typecheck
